title: Update regarding VELO
story_body:
VELO Corp. (VELO) shares rose in pre-market trading after unconfirmed reports emerged of a potential acquisition.

According to people familiar with the matter, who spoke on condition of anonymity due to the speculative nature of the discussions, VELO Corp. may be a target for acquisition. The sources, who have a mixed track record of accuracy, claim that several parties have expressed interest in acquiring the company.

It is unclear at this time whether any formal offers have been made or if discussions are ongoing. The people familiar with the matter caution that the rumors are unconfirmed and may not materialize into a deal.

VELO Corp. has not commented on the reports, and no official statement has been released. The company's shares have been volatile in recent trading sessions, and it is unclear whether the rumored acquisition talks have contributed to the price movement.

As of 08:45 ET, VELO Corp. shares were up 4.2% in pre-market trading. Further details are not available at this time, and investors should exercise caution when interpreting unconfirmed reports.

VELO Corp. will report its quarterly earnings on [no date specified], and investors will be closely watching for any comments on the rumored acquisition talks. However, it is unclear whether the company will address the speculation during the earnings call.
